last_episode_to_air.name: The Nan
last_episode_to_air.overview: John enlists the help of his Nana Rose reluctantly to wait in for a parcel delivery. Kayleigh can't find her house key and is stuck inside her sister Mandy's house so John attempts to pick the lock with a hair pin before resorting to trying to pull Kayleigh out through a small window, which doesn't go according to plan.

name: Peter Kay's Car Share
overview: John Redmond and Kayleigh Kitson have been thrown together in a company car share scheme, forcing their paths to cross. Each trip brings fresh insight into John and Kayleigh's lives, with twists and turns in their unlikely relationship.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: John and Kayleigh have been thrown together in a company car-share scheme.

episodes.name: The Sample
episodes.overview: When a supermarket issues a new car share scheme, assistant manager John Redmond and promotions rep Kayleigh Kitson are forced to commute together each day. But will they get along?

episodes.name: The Funeral
episodes.overview: Due to an unfortunate event at work John and Kayleigh are required to take the morning off, but as a result they manage to get to know each other a little bit better.

episodes.name: The Fishmonger
episodes.overview: Kayleigh is running late but John is determined to get to work on time as the last thing he needs on the journey are any further delays.

episodes.name: The Superstitions
episodes.overview: With a fancy new hands free phone kit fitted in his car John arrives at Kayleigh's house only to discover she's far more excited by previous night's events.

episodes.name: The Kids
episodes.overview: It's John's Nan's birthday but he's forgotten to post her card. Will he be able to put things right on the journey en route to work?

episodes.name: The Final Car Share
episodes.overview: Kayleigh has a lot on her mind, the last thing she needs is to be dressed as a blackcurrant for National Jam Week. Luckily John is on hand to give her some unwanted encouragement and advice.

episodes.name: The Cyclist
episodes.overview: After moving in with her sister, Kayleigh is now traveling on her own to work, but will she manage to resist temptation or will she call her old car-share buddy John?

episodes.name: The Smurf
episodes.overview: John and Kayleigh are full of high spirits as they head off on their annual works do.

episodes.name: The Day Off
episodes.overview: Kayleigh has had enough of work and fancies a day off but John isnâ€™t having any of it. Or is he?

episodes.name: The Nan
episodes.overview: John enlists the help of his Nana Rose reluctantly to wait in for a parcel delivery. Kayleigh can't find her house key and is stuck inside her sister Mandy's house so John attempts to pick the lock with a hair pin before resorting to trying to pull Kayleigh out through a small window, which doesn't go according to plan.
